short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to set and restore API names for Dynamics

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension that changes the labels of columns in your Dynamics webpage view to display the API names. This is useful when you want to export data from Dynamics. This extension will help you select the right columns.
